#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
//The question is equivalent to finding the smallest power of 2 less than the given number
int main()
{
 int t,n,z=1;

 scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
  z=1;
    scanf("%d",&n);
   while(z<=n)
      z*=2;
     printf("%d\n",z/2);
  }
  return 0;
}
